T11D4213:254a-37: mtshan nyid la las nges pa zhes bya ba'i sgra rab tu sbyor ba yin no //
T11D4213:254a-38: de lta ma yin na shes bya yod par rnam
T11D4213:254a-39: par gzhag pa ni shes pa yod pa'i rgyu rkyen
T11D4213:254a-40: yin pa'i phyir / de gnyis nyid yod par rab
T11D4213:254a-41: tu mi 'grub pas thams cad la yod pa rnam
T11D4213:254a-42: par gzhag pa nyid de sgrub pa dang ldan pa'i
T11D4213:254b-0: @254b bstan bcos byed pa ni gzhan gyi don yin pa'i yang phyir te /
T11D4213:254b-1: tshul gsum pa'i rtags yod pa ni /
T11D4213:254b-2: don 'doms par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba la /
T11D4213:254b-3: gang dag tshul de mi shes pa de dag ni /
T11D4213:254b-4: des mi 'jug pas gzhan shas par byed pa yin pa'i phyir shes pa grub mod kyi /
T11D4213:254b-5: 'on kyang kha cig yod pa dang /
T11D4213:254b-6: med pa de dag kho na mthong ba dang /
T11D4213:254b-7: ma mthong ba tsam gyis rnam par 'jog par byed pas /
T11D4213:254b-8: de dgag pa'i phyir nges pa'i sgra smos so //
T11D4213:254b-9: yod pa dang med pa dag yod kyang rjes su 'gro ba dang /
T11D4213:254b-10: ldog pa dag yod pa la the tshom za ba'i phyir /
T11D4213:254b-11: yod par rab tu 'grub pa ni tshad ma gang
T11D4213:254b-12: las 'di gnyis nges pa de la rag lus pa
T11D4213:254b-13: yin no zhes shes par bya ba'i phyir /
T11D4213:254b-14: kho bos smos par byas pa yin no //
T11D4213:254b-15: gang gi phyir yod pa dang med pa smos pa
T11D4213:254b-16: tsam gyis de sgrub pa'i tshad ma 'phen par 'grub
T11D4213:254b-17: pa de'i phyir yang shes pa ni mtshan nyid tha
T11D4213:254b-18: dad par gyur pa ma yin te /
T11D4213:254b-19: de nyid kyi don rtogs pa'i phyir /
T11D4213:254b-20: phyogs kyi chos nyid las nye bar gtod pa'i don bzhin no //
T11D4213:254b-21: 'o na ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag kyang so so nyid ma yin te /
T11D4213:254b-22: gcig sbyar bas gnyi ga rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhe na ma yin te /
T11D4213:254b-23: mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag la gtan tshigs yod pa dang /
T11D4213:254b-24: med pa dag ni phan tshun ltos nas tshig gcig gis gnyi ga go bar byed do zhes bya'i /
T11D4213:254b-25: gnyis pa dang don gcig pa ni ma yin no //
T11D4213:254b-26: de kho na la yod pa dang med pa la
T11D4213:254b-27: med pa zhes bya ba'i tshig phan tshun 'phen pa
T11D4213:254b-29: nges pa ston pa gcig kyang 'phen pa gnyis pa
T11D4213:254b-30: med na med pa'i phyir tshig 'dis ni shugs kyis
T11D4213:254b-32: yod pa dang med pa 'ba' zhig 'phen par byed pa ni ma yin no //
T11D4213:254b-33: nges pa dang ldan pa dag ni 'ba' zhig pa dag ma yin te /
T11D4213:254b-34: nges pa ni gnyi ga'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11D4213:254b-35: de lta bas na gang gis na yod pa'am /
T11D4213:254b-36: med pa gnyis pa 'phen par 'gyur ba de la
T11D4213:254b-37: yod pa nyid ces bya ba yang yod pa 'ba'
T11D4213:254b-39: cig shos kyis kyang med pa 'ba' zhig ma yin no //
T11D4213:254b-40: shes pa ni de ltar gzhan shes par byed pa'i
T11D4213:254b-41: mtshan nyid gsum pa las tha dad pa ma yin
T11D4213:254b-42: pas / mtshan nyid gzhan ma yin no //
T11D4213:255a-0: de lta bas na gtan tshigs @255a * //
T11D4213:255a-1: ni mtshan nyid drug pa ma yin no //
T11D4213:255a-2: gtan tshigs kyi thigs pa slob dpon chos kyi grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T11D4213:255a-4: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra dzny'a wa ra
T11D4213:255a-5: ma dang zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong
T11D4213:255a-6: dpal brtsegs rakshi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la
